concept.title: Instrument lights
concept.shortdesc: The instrument light switch illuminates the instrument panel.

conbody.p: When the pilot/vehicle lights are switched on, use the instrument light switch to illuminate the instrument panel for night driving.
The instrument light switch is located on the driver's side of the instrument panel.
